issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Under Tez and Vectorization, ReduceWork not getting vectorized unless it GROUP BY operator is MergePartial.  Add valid cases where GROUP BY is Hash (and presumably there are downstream reducers that will do MergePartial).
fields.summary: Vectorization : Tez Reduce vertex not getting vectorized when GROUP BY is Hash mode
